roles.title: Storyboard Artist (2D/3D)
roles.description: Storyboard artists create visual breakdowns for scenes, cameras, and timing to guide the production pipeline.
bullets: Work with directors to refine shots

roles.title: Concept Artist (2D/3D)
roles.description: Concept artists develop the look and feel for characters, props, and worlds used across the production.
bullets: Produce style frames and color keys
Collaborate with art direction for consistency

roles.title: Voice Actor
roles.brief: Bring characters to life through performance.
roles.description: Voice actors provide character voices and emotional performance for the cast, often collaborating on direction and tone.
bullets: Work with directors for character tone

roles.title: 3D Asset / Prop Artist
roles.brief: Model props and small set pieces.
roles.description: Create production-ready props and small assets ensuring correct topology and UVs for texturing and animation.
bullets: Work with texture and lighting teams

roles.title: 3D Character Artist
roles.description: Character artists sculpt and model protagonists and supporting cast with production-ready topology and detail maps.

roles.title: 3D Animator
roles.description: Animators create polished motion for characters and creatures, refining timing, weight, and acting to match direction.

roles.title: Texturing & Surface Artist
roles.description: Texture artists create surface maps and material setups to achieve the final look under production lighting.
bullets: Produce PBR maps and trim sheets
Work with lookdev and lighting teams

roles.title: Environment Artist
roles.description: Environment artists craft believable worlds and environments, from blockout to final layout and detailing.

roles.title: Rigger
roles.description: Riggers build skeletons and control rigs enabling animators to pose and animate characters reliably.

roles.title: Lighting Artist
roles.brief: Light scenes for mood and clarity.
roles.description: Lighting artists create the final lighting for shots, balancing mood, clarity, and render performance.

roles.title: Render Technician Artist
roles.description: Render techs handle farm submissions, troubleshooting, and deliverable pipelines to ensure frames render consistently.

roles.title: Sound Designer
roles.description: Sound designers craft effects, ambiences, and mixes that enhance the emotional storytelling of each shot.
bullets: Mix and sync audio to picture
